trans-unit.source: Provides data for the context menu event.
trans-unit.target: 提供內容功能表事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal position of the mouse.
When the user opens a context menu by right clicking the mouse, this property returns the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者開啟內容功能表以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠時，這個屬性會傳回滑鼠位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties does not affect the value of CursorLeft.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性不會影響 CursorLeft 的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: When the user opens a context menu by using the keyboard, or when the context menu closes, the value of this property is -1.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者使用鍵盤，開啟操作功能表或操作功能表關閉時，這個屬性的值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the mouse.
Gets the vertical position of the mouse.
When the user opens a context menu by right clicking the mouse, this property returns the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者開啟內容功能表以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠時，這個屬性會傳回滑鼠位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties does not affect the value of CursorTop.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性不會影響 CursorTop 的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: When the user opens a context menu by using the keyboard, or when the context menu closes, the value of this property is -1.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者使用鍵盤，開啟操作功能表或操作功能表關閉時，這個屬性的值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the mouse.
